SimpleSelect.description: Basic SELECT query: SELECT id, name FROM users
SimpleSelect.current_performance: ~450 ns/op in CI, ~265 ns/op local (9 allocs, 536 B/op)
SimpleSelect.note: CI environments are slower than local machines; baselines set for CI

ComplexQuery.description: Complex SELECT with JOIN, WHERE, ORDER BY, LIMIT
ComplexQuery.current_performance: ~1900 ns/op in CI, ~1020 ns/op local (36 allocs, 1433 B/op)
ComplexQuery.note: CI environments are slower than local machines; baselines set for CI

WindowFunction.description: Window function query: ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ... ORDER BY ...)
WindowFunction.current_performance: ~690 ns/op in CI, ~400 ns/op local (14 allocs, 760 B/op)
WindowFunction.note: CI environments are slower than local machines; baselines set for CI

CTE.description: Common Table Expression with WITH clause
CTE.current_performance: ~680 ns/op in CI, ~395 ns/op local (14 allocs, 880 B/op)
CTE.note: CI environments are slower than local machines; baselines set for CI

INSERT.current_performance: ~535 ns/op in CI, ~310 ns/op local (14 allocs, 536 B/op)
INSERT.note: CI environments are slower than local machines; baselines set for CI

TokenizationThroughput.description: Tokenizer throughput in tokens per second

EndToEndSustained.description: End-to-end sustained throughput in operations per second
